member.name: ISurrogate.FreeSurrogate
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: ISurrogate.LoadDllServer
member.summary: Loads a DLL server into the implementing surrogate. COM calls this method when there is an activation request for the DLL server's class, if the class is registered as DllSurrogate.
member.param: The CLSID of the DLL server to be loaded.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, and S_OK.

member.name: ISurrogate
member.summary: Used to dynamically load new DLL servers into an existing surrogate and free the surrogate when it is no longer needed.
